Sentencas: The impact of the sampling time interval for energy demands on the optimal operational planning of residential cogeneration systems without electric power export was analyzed.
Titulo: Impact analysis of sampling time interval and battery installation on optimal operational planning of residential cogeneration systems without electric power export

Sentencas: To improve their operational flexibility, focus was also placed on battery installation.
Titulo: Impact analysis of sampling time interval and battery installation on optimal operational planning of residential cogeneration systems without electric power export

Sentencas: First, an optimal operational planning problem was modeled on the basis of a mixed-integer linear programming.
Titulo: Impact analysis of sampling time interval and battery installation on optimal operational planning of residential cogeneration systems without electric power export

Sentencas: The features of the model are to consider the operational constraints of the cogeneration units, i.e., a daily maximum number of start -stop cycles, minimum up- and downtimes, and starting and shutdown energies, and to introduce a battery in consideration of electric power consumption in a built-in bidirectional inverter.
Titulo: Impact analysis of sampling time interval and battery installation on optimal operational planning of residential cogeneration systems without electric power export

Sentencas: Then, the developed model was applied to an energy-saving analysis of the following residential cogeneration systems under 5-60 min sampling time intervals for the simulated energy demands.
Titulo: Impact analysis of sampling time interval and battery installation on optimal operational planning of residential cogeneration systems without electric power export

Sentencas: A gas engine-based cogeneration system is operated at a constant power output; a polymer electrolyte fuel cell-based cogeneration system employs daily start stop operation; and a solid oxide fuel cell-based cogeneration system is operated continuously.
Titulo: Impact analysis of sampling time interval and battery installation on optimal operational planning of residential cogeneration systems without electric power export

Sentencas: The results revealed that optimal operational planning under a sufficiently short sampling time interval is required to evaluate not only the energy-saving effect of the residential cogeneration systems without electric power export, but also the effectiveness of battery installation.
Titulo: Impact analysis of sampling time interval and battery installation on optimal operational planning of residential cogeneration systems without electric power export
